mapper.select: SELECT * FROM novel WHERE novel_title = #{novel_title} ORDER BY novel_idx DESC limit #{offset}, #{noOfRecords}

SELECT max(novel_idx) as novel_idx, novel_title, novel_id, max(novel_date) as novel_date, max(novel_chapter) as novel_chapter FROM novel GROUP BY novel_title ORDER BY novel_idx DESC limit #{offset}, #{noOfRecords}
SELECT count(c.novel_title) FROM( SELECT novel_title FROM novel GROUP BY novel_title ) AS c
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO novel( novel_title, novel_id, novel_content, novel_date, novel_chapter )VALUES( #{novel_title}, #{novel_id}, #{novel_content}, now(), #{novel_chapter} )
mapper.update: UPDATE novel SET novel_content, novel_date, novel_chapter WHERE novel_idx = #{novel_idx};
